In England, in the seven days to 12 January, there were 638,372 new confirmed cases (1,128.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 January, there were 1,061,873 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 40% (423,501 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 January is 12,979,908 (22,952.9 cases per 100,000 population).
